snippet.title: H1Z1 PlayStation 4 Announce Teaser [OFFICIAL]
snippet.description:
On May 22, 2018, H1Z1 is officially coming to PlayStation 4, and will be FREE TO PLAY!  SIGN UP NOW AT https://www.h1z1.com/PlayStation4 

H1Z1 on PS4™ is designed specifically for the console and focuses exclusively on the core elements that make battle royale exciting. The game features a NEW weapon progression system, fully reworked UI, along with new weapons and gear.

---

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/H1Z1 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/H1Z1
Join the discussion on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/h1z1/ 
Watch live on Twitch:  https://www.twitch.tv/H1Z1
